item.title: Privacy and secrecy
item.description: There will not be any civilization worth the name if it does not grant certain amount of privacy to its members. But different civilizations put different premium on it.Â Privacy does not fascinate Indians much. Most of us will see it with indifference. I am not aware of a large amount of work done on ‘privacy’ by our sociologists. We lack a sound theory on it. Our understanding and appreciation of privacy is very low.
